post.title: How to find where a jewish person is buried in London uk
post.content:
How to find where a jewish person is buried in London uk

The first thing to do is, search the records for the year of death, on freebmd.

Once you have found the year and spelling of the namae on the death certificate you can start to look for where they are buried.

I have all the links to the jewish burial societies indexes, on my website at family-history.tips.
post.author: robin
